svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 4, 2023" date: "2023-11-03"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
Agreed to Deneb simplification (blob sidecar inclusion proof), ~3 weeks to implement,
delays next devnet but gives safer mainnet Devnet 11 launched
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Agreed to Deneb simplification (blob sidecar inclusion proof), ~3 weeks to implement,
delays next devnet but gives safer mainnet
* Devnet 11 launched
Devnet 11 launched
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.4 : adds blob sidecar inclusion proof
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.4 : adds blob sidecar inclusion proof
* Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.34% continues to reduce but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.34% continues to reduce but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 43% &
Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
* Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of
US/Canada/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Layer 1
* Guide to run Reth (Rust EL client) + Lighthouse on Ubuntu v20.04
Guide to run Reth (Rust EL client) + Lighthouse on Ubuntu v20.04
* Node on Playstation 4 : syncs HoleÅ¡ky testnet
Node on Playstation 4 : syncs HoleÅ¡ky testnet
* Verkle implementers call notes
Verkle implementers call notes
For Stakers
* Beacon chain: millionth validator index number assigned
Client releases
* Execution layer: EthereumJS releases : HoleÅ¡ky testnet support, Dencun devnet 11
support & EVM profiler
* EthereumJS releases : HoleÅ¡ky testnet support, Dencun devnet 11 support & EVM
profiler
Research
* CeFi-DeFi arbitrage influence on order-flow auction (OFA) bid profiles
Layer 2
* Vitalik: types of layer 2s , rollup & validium spectrum, dimensions of withdrawing
security & reading security
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs EIP7547 : Inclusion lists EIP7549 : Move committee index outside Attestation
EIPs
* EIP7547 : Inclusion lists
EIP7547 : Inclusion lists
* EIP7549 : Move committee index outside Attestation
EIP7549 : Move committee index outside Attestation
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7548 : Open IP protocol (remix ERC721 NFTs) ERC7550 :
Transient ERC20 approvals ERC7551 : Crypto security token contract interface ERC7552 :
Decentralized embedding registry
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7548 : Open IP protocol (remix ERC721 NFTs)
ERC7548 : Open IP protocol (remix ERC721 NFTs)
* ERC7550 : Transient ERC20 approvals
ERC7550 : Transient ERC20 approvals
* ERC7551 : Crypto security token contract interface
ERC7551 : Crypto security token contract interface
* ERC7552 : Decentralized embedding registry
ERC7552 : Decentralized embedding registry
Stuff for developers
* Hardhat: Hardhat v2.19.0 : adds configuration variables (stored in plain text) Guide
to deploying a contract with Hardhat Ignition
Hardhat:
* Hardhat v2.19.0 : adds configuration variables (stored in plain text)
Hardhat v2.19.0 : adds configuration variables (stored in plain text)
* Guide to deploying a contract with Hardhat Ignition
Guide to deploying a contract with Hardhat Ignition
* Gaslite Splitter : gas optimized contract for splitting ERC20 & ETH payments
Gaslite Splitter : gas optimized contract for splitting ERC20 & ETH payments
* Solid-grinder : reduce L2 gas cost by encoding calldata, front end snippets & CLI
Solid-grinder : reduce L2 gas cost by encoding calldata, front end snippets & CLI
* Reinforced-Concrete-Huff : hash function for bn254 curve, ported to Huff
Reinforced-Concrete-Huff : hash function for bn254 curve, ported to Huff
* Fe (language) v0.26.0 : option to produce runtime bytecode and verify onchain
contracts against local source code
Fe (language) v0.26.0 : option to produce runtime bytecode and verify onchain contracts
against local source code
* Addreth : React component to display ETH addresses
Addreth : React component to display ETH addresses
* Web3py-discord-bot : example repo using web3.py websocket provider
Web3py-discord-bot : example repo using web3.py websocket provider
* Paradigm CTF write up (from 2nd placed Kalos)
Paradigm CTF write up (from 2nd placed Kalos)
* Securing C (language) code : best practices used to secure c-kzg-4844 C library
Securing C (language) code : best practices used to secure c-kzg-4844 C library
Security
* Onyx protocol (Compound v2 fork) $2.1M exploit via precision loss vulnerability
Onyx protocol (Compound v2 fork) $2.1M exploit via precision loss vulnerability
* Unibot router $600k exploit via suspected lack of input validation allowing arbitrary
call
Unibot router $600k exploit via suspected lack of input validation allowing arbitrary
* Astrid Finance $230K exploit via lack of input validation in withdraw
Astrid Finance $230K exploit via lack of input validation in withdraw
Ecosystem
* ETHGlobal ETHOnline finalists
ETHGlobal ETHOnline finalists
* Gitcoin Grants 19 applications open
Gitcoin Grants 19 applications open
* Etherscan address highlighting on hover
Etherscan address highlighting on hover
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.4 to 95.2 gwei, with 21.1 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 21.6 gwei 450 ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.4 to 95.2 gwei, with 21.1 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 21.6 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.6 gwei
* 450 ETH net issuance this week
450 ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $1,774 - $1,865, currently $1,828
ETHUSD : $1,774 - $1,865, currently $1,828
* ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* WalletConnect reenabling access to Russia & occupied Ukraine after previously
blocking based on legal & OFAC guidance
WalletConnect reenabling access to Russia & occupied Ukraine after previously blocking
based on legal & OFAC guidance
* Aragon Association dissolving
Aragon Association dissolving
* Drawtech live on Base, shared canvas onchain mobile game
Drawtech live on Base, shared canvas onchain mobile game
* OpenSea staff layoffs
OpenSea staff layoffs
Job Listings
* Nethermind: Smart Contract Auditor , Smart Contract Auditor (Rust) & BizDev
Nethermind: Smart Contract Auditor , Smart Contract Auditor (Rust) & BizDev
* Gnosis seek DevRels , Senior Web Devs (Wallet) & Backend Devs
Gnosis seek DevRels , Senior Web Devs (Wallet) & Backend Devs
* ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit).Â Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* SBF found guilty on all 7 counts, sentencing set for March 28
SBF found guilty on all 7 counts, sentencing set for March 28
* SafeMoon executives charged with securities fraud, wire fraud and money laundering
SafeMoon executives charged with securities fraud, wire fraud and money laundering
* SEC crypto accounting bulletin should have been submitted to Congress
SEC crypto accounting bulletin should have been submitted to Congress
* PayPal received SEC subpoena for PYUSD stablecoin
PayPal received SEC subpoena for PYUSD stablecoin
* UK Treasury response to crypto regulation consultation
UK Treasury response to crypto regulation consultation
General
* DPRK target blockchain engineers with macOS malware
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-4-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Nov 13-19 â€“ Devconnect (Istanbul), update 2
Nov 13-19 â€“ Devconnect (Istanbul), update 2
* Nov 15-21 â€“ DCxPrague (Devconnect satellite event in Prague)
Nov 15-21 â€“ DCxPrague (Devconnect satellite event in Prague)
* Nov 15-29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19
Nov 15-29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19
* Nov 16-19 â€“ Pragma & ETHGlobal Istanbul
Nov 16-19 â€“ Pragma & ETHGlobal Istanbul
* Nov 18 â€“ Ethereum Costa Rica
Nov 18 â€“ Ethereum Costa Rica
* Nov 30 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
Nov 30 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
* Dec 4 â€“ ETHVenice
Dec 4 â€“ ETHVenice
* Dec 6-7 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
Dec 6-7 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
* Dec 8-10 â€“ ETHGlobal ETHIndia (Bangalore)
